issue.title: Valkyrie Drops to the Ground due to incorrect delays in startup script

content.raw:
Facing the same issue. No idea what to do. One thing I noticed is when I did step 12, in the end I got a message:
Build Successful  
followed by:
**Required Process IHMCValkyrieROSAPI-2 has died.**
And then: process has finished cleanly
Is it normal?
content.html:
